channel.title: [317][Delta source]How do I code portals with multiple options?
channel.description:
I know this is a very simple feature, but I'm new to 317s, having previously coded RSC emulations.
How do I make a portal that offers the user multiple options and then -teleports- them there, not transports instantly?
Thanks,
d.v.c

item.title: [317][Delta source]How do I code portals with multiple options?
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Do what JC said.
